com.amihaiemil.eva

Class Solution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amihaiemil.eva.Solution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryArraySolution

    public abstract class Solution
extends Object
    Abstract class to be extended by a possible solution of the algorithm.
    Author:
    Mihai Andronache (amihaiemil@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getFitness

        public Fitness getFitness()
        Each solution should have a comparable fitness that makes it better or worse than other solutions.
        Returns:
        The Fitness of this solution.

      • setFitness

        public void setFitness(Fitness fitness)
        Set the fitness of this solution.
        Parameters:
        fitness - The set fitness of this solution.

      • getRepresentation

        public Representation getRepresentation()
        Each solution should have a representation.
        Returns:
        The representation of this solution.

      • setRepresentation

        public void setRepresentation(Representation rep)

      • mutate

        public abstract void mutate(double pm)
        Mutate (change) this solution's representation with regards to pm - possibility of mutation.
        Parameters:
        pm - A random chosen double (0 < pm < 1) that should give the random element in this solution's mutation.

      • crossover

        public abstract Solution crossover(Solution partner,
                                   double cp)
        Crossover this solution with the given partner. In other words, create a new solution with data taken from both this solution and the partner.
        Parameters:
        partner - Another solution.
        cp - Crossover probability.
        Returns:
        The newly created solution.

      • isAcceptable

        public boolean isAcceptable()
        A solution is acceptable if its fitness is ok.
        Returns:
        true if acceptable, false otherwise.
